LanguageData.IbuprofienHediff.stages.1.description: Ibuprofien affects my mind quite strongly

LanguageData.IngalinHediff.stages.0.label: exposure to inhalin
LanguageData.IngalinHediff.stages.0.description: Ingalin affects my body. I feel bad.
LanguageData.JoycstasyHediff.stages.0.label: I do not care
LanguageData.JoycstasyHediff.stages.0.description: I see a purpose, but I do not see obstacles
LanguageData.JoycstasyAddiction.stages.1.label: loss of interest in life
LanguageData.JoycstasyAddiction.stages.1.description: I see no point in mortal being.
LanguageData.MetolidocaineHediff.stages.0.label: chemical restructuring
LanguageData.MetolidocaineHediff.stages.0.description: Something is happening inside of me, and very damn nice!
LanguageData.MutagenicSerumDebuffHediffThought.stages: I feel something change inside me, it’s not very pleasant and painful
I feel something change inside me, it’s not very pleasant and painful
I feel something change inside me, it’s not very pleasant and painful
I feel something change inside me, it’s not very pleasant and painful
I feel something change inside me, it’s not very pleasant and painful
LanguageData.NarkoataHediff.stages.0.label: Buzz
LanguageData.NarkoataHediff.stages.0.description: Oh I, I feel the heat and I I touch the flesh and bone And I feel the kiss of fire Too fast to live, too fast to die.
LanguageData.PemotilanWithdrawal.stages.1.label: Pemotilan withdrawal
LanguageData.PemotilanWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
LanguageData.PemotilanAddition.stages.0.label: Pemotilan effect
LanguageData.PemotilanAddition.stages.0.description: I don’t feel very good after consuming Pemotilan, I hope it doesn’t last long
LanguageData.PemotilanAddition.stages.1.label: Pemotilan effect
LanguageData.PemotilanAddition.stages.1.description: I don’t feel very good after consuming Pemotilan, I hope it doesn’t last long
LanguageData.VamitexEasyHediff.stages.0.label: Vamitex
LanguageData.VamitexEasyHediff.stages.0.description: Taste bad, but my health seems to be on the mend
LanguageData.VamitexHeavyHediff.stages.0.label: Vamitex
LanguageData.VamitexHeavyHediff.stages.0.description: Taste bad, but my health seems to be on the mend
LanguageData.AwesomeSight.stages.0.label: Awesome Sight
LanguageData.PositiveCharge.stages.0.label: Positive Charge
LanguageData.PositiveCharge.stages.0.description: Despondency is for the weak. I am ready for any problems and mood not to break me!
LanguageData.MentalImpact.stages.0.label: Mental impact
LanguageData.MentalImpact.stages.0.description: Every time you breathe this gas in my head, something happens.
LanguageData.SeaAir.stages.0.label: Sea air
LanguageData.SeaAir.stages.0.description: I feel the fresh, bracing sea air
LanguageData.MountainAir.stages.0.label: Mountain air
LanguageData.MountainAir.stages.0.description: I feel the freshness of the mountains
